script:
1). Is the coffee included in the price on this menu?
The sweets are rather expensive, in my opinion.
I'm not particularly thirsty at the moment.
Yes, it's an all inclusive price. 
2). The question is whether we drink coffee here or at home.
Sometimes it's surprising how much a small cup of coffee costs.
It's probably better to stay here and have our coffee. 
The last time I came here the coffee was stone cold.
3). The question is whether we decide to tip the waiter or not.
Surely he deserves a little extra for his good service. 
I think the service has been very slow.
We did have to wait along time for the main dish.
